dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1822 IH: To extend the authorization period for certain uses of funds from the San Gabriel Basin Restoration Fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Chu (for herself, Ms. Linda T. Sánchez of California, and Mrs. Napolitano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authorization period for certain uses of funds from the San Gabriel Basin Restoration Fund.

subsection.text: Section 110(a)(3)(A)(ii) of division B of the Miscellaneous Appropriations Act, 2001 (as enacted into law by section 1(a)(4) of Public Law 106–554) is amended by striking 10 and inserting 15.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to any project constructed under Section 110 of such Act before, on, or after the date of enactment of this Act.
